text: Dragutin Zelenović (; 19 May 1928 — 27 April 2020) was a Serbian educator and politician. He was rector of the University of Novi Sad. He was a member of the Serbian Academy of Sciences and Arts. He was the Prime Minister of Serbia in 1991. He was a professor at the Faculty of Technical Sciences and Rector of the University of Novi Sad (1987–89). He died on 27 April 2020 in Novi Sad, aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Serbian Academy of Sciences and Arts biography Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Serbian academics Category:Prime ministers of Serbia
title: Dragutin Zelenović
